text: Egha a mɨgɨa ghua kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Ia deraghvɨra akar kam baragh. Ia deraghvɨra a baraghɨva deragh fogh, eghtɨ God uan akabar fofozir avɨriba ia danɨngam. Godɨn akabagh fozir gumazitam a Godɨn akar igharaziba uaghan da baragham. Eghtɨ Godɨn akabagh foghan aghuazir gumazitam, an fofozir muziarim God a dama inigham. Ia Godɨn akam barazi moghɨn God uaghan kamaghɨn damuva, bizir avɨrir maba sara ia damuam.”
